title: Drastic change in cutoffs from last year - is the PES bar dropped? Will it impact placements in future?
content:
**2023 Cutoffs:**

https://preview.redd.it/yc2r81jncbmd1.jpg?width=1600&format=pjpg&auto=webp&s=5be437352503d3446b5462f7613a90c31f9ed12d

**2024 Cuttoffs:**  
RR campus:   
- CSE: 1876  
- CSE AI/ML: 3177  
  
EC campus:   
- CSE: 5160   
- CSE AI/ML: 7.5k

**Cutt off change:**  
- CSE RR dropped from 1238 to 1876  
- CSE AI/ML RR dropped from 1869 to 3177  
- CSE EC dropped from 3322 to 5160  
- CSE AI/ML EC dropped from 4152 to 7.5k

comments.body: Even I feel it is a major concern

ü§£this year ig they didn't convert it to management seats
The kcet cutoffs are nearly same

As bms have drastically increased the seats it's cutoffs have increased and ig many people joining pes cs through pessat now get bms cs through kcet which is way more worth it considering the cost and a nearly equal college
Aiml in ec campus basically a participation trophy
or is it possible that they chose pes ec through kcet because of the fees? hence they left the rr cse seats.
That even last year they might have taken and ec campus cutoff is nearly the same through cet only bms has increased drastically
Is there any news about KCET cutoff for CSE / AIML?
What was the cutoff for ece in RR campus?
Kcet and jee quota has not changed, plus number of seats increased in lots of colleges so that night have effected it.
I think now they want some more ‚Äúreputation‚Äù thats why they didn‚Äôt convert pessat seats to management seats, also they‚Äôre gonna accept only jee mains/kcet, so thats also a point.

lol I'm  2025 batch ,in pessat that yr ec campus cse used to close at 2k change. Ig cutoffs have taken a drastic drop because of the the intake increase. Ofc it will affect the quality of students. Just because the college increase their intake doesn't mean the companies will hire more than usual , that depends on the job market and basic demand supply. So yes it will definitely affect placements stats atleast percentage placed wise.
Fr 2026 batch here, our batch has 720 CSE + 180 Aiml + 720 CSE (EC campus) ngl the pressure for 2025 internships is real pain,feels like a race bcz of leetcode!

Unless you willingly opt for it(much like meüíÄüíÄüíÄ)

Tbf I want to continue with masters in the same field
Fr there are other options like bmsce which has massively increased seat intake with much lesser fees through comedk. Almost 5 lakhs an year is definitely not worth it.
I doubt it's that big of a deal since they're discontinuing PESSAT
